metadata.description: Take a trip through the workshop of several imaginary Tony Starks as you feast your eyes on a mind-bending array of Iron Man armors built from some very far out disciplines - steampunk, Spaghetti Westerns and World War II-era aeronautics, to name just a few! It's an explosion of creativity by some of the art world's most brilliant artists on one of Marvel's most innovative characters!
metadata.name: Iron Man By Design
